name: hearmobiletalkradio
0:
”Alexa play community talk radio”
”Alexa launch community talk radio”
”Alexa load community talk radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: community talk radio
des: News and Information focused on the needs of our community as it relates to all matters past, present and future. In the words of Samuel Cornish and John B. Russwurm on the front page of Freedom’s Journal, the first African-American owned and operated newspaper published in the United States, “We wish to plead our own cause. Too long have others spoken for us." This is the mission of and for Community Talk Radio.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
